pages.title: Memories
pages.text: With the [Spirit Instiller](book://creating_life/spirit_instiller), you are able to breathe new life into a once dead creature.\It will materialise in the form of a _Memory_.

pages.title: Spirit Inst. Recipe
pages.text: To remember the memories about a creature, you need its [Head](book://creating_life/mob_heads), as well as its most beloved item and [Vegetal](book://creating_life/fading@vegetal) as a bonding agent.\Using [Neolith](book://creating_life/failing@neolith) seems to completely overpower the energies of the creature, making the resulting Memory unrecognizable, until it manifests.

pages.title: Manifesting
pages.text: Memories need a certain amount of time to manifest, almost like an egg: you have to place them down and wait. Depending on the creature, it may be reasonably quick, or take forever.\\_Placing them on top of certain blocks seems to speed up that process or stop it entirely._

pages.title: Reviving Bosses
pages.text: With your vast knowledge, you are now even able to resurrect Ender Dragons, Withers and Wardens.
